ygData.subject: RE: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: It only seems logical that they would.  The lag would be due to the processing of more graphics on your screen.  The more stuff on the screen, the more lag you
ygData.messageBody:
It only seems logical that they would. The lag would be due to the
processing of more graphics on your screen. The more stuff on the screen,
the more lag you will have.

-----Original Message-----
From: Moe Drippins [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 10:35 AM
To: Kevin Dailey
Cc: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Rez changed


From: Moe Drippins <ug@...>

Kevin Dailey writes:
> From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
>
> Mystik wrote:
>
> "i agree.....i get sick of zoning into unrest and cazic and lagging
> just because of the corpse rate...those are the zones that sadly to
> say, i have to turn off particle density because i lag too much with
> them on...."

Can anyone confirm (as in from Verant) that corpses increase lag? I've
heard this for a long time, but I don't really understand it.

--
Frake, Rodcet Nife
Iilii, Xegony
